rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: The entrance hall is spacious to welcome visitors and facilitate smooth circulation, designed in accordance with Vastu principles ensuring a positive flow of energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A multifunctional living room that can double as the home theater area, featuring flexible seating and modern audio-visual integration. The design uses minimal but functional decor to maintain budget efficiency.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, this dining area fosters family meals and gatherings. The layout is open-plan with modular seating options.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficient kitchen design featuring essential appliances, storage solutions, and a central island for joint family gatherings. The layout adheres to local building norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with built-in storage and an en-suite bathroom, designed for privacy while still being accessible to the rest of the family.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A compact guest bedroom with adequate storage space and natural light, ensuring comfort for visitors.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large glass doors at the main entrance, promoting natural light and enhancing visual connectivity with the garden.

openings.name: Window
openings.description: Windows strategically placed to provide cross ventilation, adhering to Vastu guidelines for optimal energy flow.

openings.name: Swimming Pool Entrance

openings.name: Garden Access Door
